thread.section_title: Macy's Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Macy's | www.macys.com
thread.title: Sophie Williams

author: Sophie Williams
title: Sophie Williams
text: Amazing store, so many different departments and places to shop. Ruben who works for the perfume section downstairs is amazing, he helped so much and helped me find my perfect perfume! He allowed me to try some perfume on which helped me smell so great! Ruben, if you're reading this then carry on doing your job great! The Mary Kate and Ashley perfume collection which you cant get in the UK is a must buy!!
